settings.heading: Your bottle, now with purification & self-cleaning

settings.text: Clean bottle. Fresh water. All day long. The ultimate upgrade.
Pod is a water purifier powered by UVC light designed to live inside your water bottle. It constantly purifies bacteria and viruses in your water while always keeping your bottle clean.

settings.title: Self-cleaning, automagically
settings.text: Pod turns on every 2 hours to keep your bottle clean and your water pure. No more nasty smells.

settings.title: Pure water anywhere
settings.text:
Eliminate up to 99.99%* of germs and bacteria in your water and bottle. Just fill up and shake!

¬†

* Tested on E.Coli in Nuvoe Bottles using 3-min Deep Clean

settings.title: Travel without worries
settings.text: Have confidence in your drinking water when you're on the go. Pod always has your back. Hakuna matata!

Whether it's a Hydro Flask, Yeti or Klean Kanteen, insulated or not, made out of plastic, glass or metal, Pod has got your back. Just attach a Magnetic Anchor to the outside of your bottle and drop in Pod. Easy!

With additional Magnetic Anchors you can even move Pod between bottles whenever you like!

settings.heading: The perfect pair, Nuvoe Pod + Bottle

settings.text: Use Pod with Nuvoe Bottle. 24h ice cold insulation, premium soft-touch elastomer sleeve, built-in Magnetic Anchor.

settings.heading: How does Nuvoe Pod work?
settings.row_content:
Pod‚Äôs TriWave purification system uses the power of narrowband 275nm UVC light to safely and effectively purify your water up to 99.99%*.

275nm light disrupts the nucleic acid and structure of cells of germs and bacteria, rendering them ineffective.

TriWave is a 3x UVC LED system that maximises coverage inside the bottle to ensure your water and bottle are as clean as can be.

settings.heading: Why should I use Nuvoe Pod in my water bottle?
settings.row_content:
Nuvoe Pod transforms your refillable bottle into a high-tech, self-cleaning water bottle that is also a UV water purifier. The Nuvoe Pod utilizes advanced UV-C light technology to eliminate up to 99.99% of bacteria and viruses, ensuring your water is fresh, clean, and safe to drink. This innovative solution not only enhances the hygiene of your bottle but also maintains the purity of your water without the need for constant scrubbing and washing.

Whether you have a favorite reusable bottle or prefer to switch between different ones, the Nuvoe Pod is designed to fit seamlessly and work efficiently. Enjoy the convenience of a self-cleaning bottle and the peace of mind that comes with knowing your hydration is at its best, no matter which bottle you choose to use.

settings.heading: What are the benefits of Nuvoe Pod over other self cleaning bottles?
settings.row_content:
Nuvoe Pod offers several advantages over traditional self-cleaning bottles, making it a versatile and convenient choice for maintaining clean, fresh water.

Unlike other self-cleaning bottles, Pod is modular and can be easily transferred between different bottles. Whether you have a small gym bottle or a large hiking bottle, Pod fits seamlessly, providing flexibility for various activities and bottle sizes.

One of the key benefits is its portability. Pod is small, lightweight, and perfect for travel, allowing you to maintain the highest hygiene standards wherever you go. If your current bottle gets damaged or if you simply want to switch bottles, you can effortlessly move the Pod to a new bottle without any hassle.

With Pod, you get the convenience of a self-cleaning system that adapts to your lifestyle, ensuring you always have access to pure and healthy water, no matter which bottle you choose to use.

settings.heading: Why should I purify tap water over drinking bottled water?
settings.row_content:
Purifying tap water with Pod offers several significant benefits over drinking bottled water:

  1. Cost-Effective: Using tap water and purifying it with Nuvoe Pod is much more economical than constantly buying bottled water. Over time, this can lead to substantial savings.
  2. Environmental Impact: By purifying tap water, you reduce the need for single-use plastic bottles, significantly lowering your environmental footprint. This helps decrease plastic waste and pollution, contributing to a healthier planet.
  3. Convenience: Purifying tap water is more convenient than carrying bottled water, especially when you have access to tap water almost everywhere. Nuvoe Pod's portability means you can have clean water on the go, anytime, anywhere.
  4. Health Benefits: Purifying tap water with UV technology ensures that your water is free from harmful bacteria and viruses, providing safe and fresh hydration. Unlike bottled water, which can sometimes be stored for long periods, purified tap water is always fresh.
  5. Versatility: Nuvoe Pod allows you to use any refillable bottle, giving you the flexibility to choose bottles of different sizes and styles according to your needs, whether for gym, hiking, or daily use.
  6. Resource Efficiency: Using tap water reduces the energy and resources involved in the production, transportation, and disposal of bottled water, making it a more sustainable choice.

By purifying tap water with Nuvoe Pod, you enjoy clean, safe, and fresh water while saving money, protecting the environment, and enjoying the convenience and flexibility of using any bottle you prefer.

settings.heading: Can I use Nuvoe Pod in my old bottle?
settings.row_content:
Yes, you can absolutely use Pod in your old bottle! One of the key advantages of Pod is its modular design, which allows it to be easily inserted into any refillable water bottle, regardless of its age or design. Pod is held securely in the middle of the bottle by a magnet, ensuring that all surfaces inside the bottle, including under the cap, are constantly cleaned by the UVC light.

This means you can upgrade your old bottle with the latest self-cleaning technology, enjoying the benefits of fresher, healthier water without needing to buy a new bottle. Whether your bottle is for the gym, hiking, or everyday use, Nuvoe Pod will fit perfectly and provide you with clean, safe hydration. If your old bottle gets damaged, you can simply transfer the Pod to a new one, maintaining the convenience and functionality of a self-cleaning UV water bottle.

settings.heading: Can I take Nuvoe Pod onto an airplane?
settings.row_content:
Yes, you can take Nuvoe Pod onto an airplane. The Pod is designed to be small, lightweight, and portable, making it an ideal travel companion. It is safe to carry in your carry-on luggage and complies with TSA regulations.

However, it's important to ensure that the bottle you are using with Pod is empty when you go through airport security. You can refill your bottle and use the Pod to purify your water once you have passed through security and have access to tap water. This way, you can enjoy clean, fresh water throughout your flight without relying on bottled water. Pod's portability and convenience make it perfect for maintaining your hydration standards while traveling.

settings.text: We design products to empower people all over the world to treat their own water. Our mission is to democratise water treatment through decentralisation and reduce environmental impact of bottling along the way. Because ultimately, clean drinking water is as important as clean air to breathe.
